title: What is the name of the song with the lyrics some where my love beautiful isles of somewhere? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is it possible you mean the theme from Dr. Zhivaho? Some Where My Love (Lara's Theme) Somewhere, My LoveFrom the Movie "Doctor Zivago" Ray Conniff Somewhere, my loveThere will be songs to singAlthough the snowCovers the hope of springSomewhere a hillBlossoms in green and goldAnd there are dreamsAll that your heart can hold Someday we'll meet again, my loveSomeday whenever the spring breaks through You'll come to me out of the long agoWarm as the wind, soft as the kiss of snowTill then my sweetThink of me now and thenGod speed my love till you are mine again Now on my own, think of me now and thenGod speed my love till you are mine again

I wonder if you have two song lyrics mixed up with each other. There is a song called “Somewhere, My Love” that was based on the main theme song in the movie Dr. Zhivago (“Lara’s Theme”), and there is a hymn called “Beautiful Isle of Somewhere.” I’m not aware of any song with all those lyrics together, but you could always write a new one! “Somewhere, My Love (Lara’s Theme)”  “Beautiful Isle of Somewhere”
